DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare two different cardioplegia solutions effect on postoperative Troponin-I and CK-MB levels after pediatric cardiac surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of the Effects of Crystalloid Cardioplegia and HTK Solution for Postoperative Troponin-I and CK-MB Levels After Pediatric Cardiac Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients scheduled for elective pediatric cardiac surgery Patients written informed consent for study participation redo surgery allergy to study drugs unstable blood pressure before cardiac surgery
